message: Let's be reasonable, 60-40 is a good deal!
I'm feeling generous, but let's make it snappy. Time is money.
Come on, Bob, you're losing value every round. Take this deal before it's too late!
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. Accept this offer, or we both lose out more.
You're losing nearly a third of the value, Bob. I'm being generous here. Take it or leave it.
